LayoutNode.Content: Full Stack Web Developer at craigslist (financial district)
LayoutNode.SRC: Full Stack Web Developer at craigslist (financial district)

LayoutNode.Content: compensation: DOE employment type: full-time craigslist seeks full stack web developers to: imagine, design, implement, test, and roll out new features ship code daily and see it loved (or hated) by millions draw from and contribute to various open source projects enjoy a tech-driven, laid-back, idealistic, fun-loving workplace
LayoutNode.SRC:
compensation: DOEemployment type: full-timecraigslist seeks full stack web developers to:
  • imagine, design, implement, test, and roll out new features
  • ship code daily and see it loved (or hated) by millions
    • draw from and contribute to various open source projects
  • enjoy a tech-driven, laid-back, idealistic, fun-loving workplace

LayoutNode.Content: Required skills:
LayoutNode.SRC: Required skills:

LayoutNode.Content: 5+ years programming experience proven ability to design, develop, and maintain web systems deep understanding of web development concepts expert level knowledge in a programming language solid troubleshooting and problem solving skills familiarity with Linux/UNIX
LayoutNode.SRC:
• 5+ years programming experience
  • proven ability to design, develop, and maintain web systems
  • deep understanding of web development concepts
  • expert level knowledge in a programming language
  • solid troubleshooting and problem solving skills
  • familiarity with Linux/UNIX

LayoutNode.Content: Experience with any of the following is beneficial, but not required:
LayoutNode.SRC: Experience with any of the following is beneficial, but not required:

LayoutNode.Content: large scale, big traffic, high performance websites security, web site vulnerabilities, phishing attacks machine learning user interface design event driven programming internationalization, encoding systems, Unicode anti-fraud / spam / scam systems accounts receivable & billing systems QA / automated testing queuing / job scheduling systems networking protocols build systems project management
LayoutNode.SRC:
• large scale, big traffic, high performance websites
  • security, web site vulnerabilities, phishing attacks
  • machine learning
  • user interface design
  • event driven programming
  • internationalization, encoding systems, Unicode
  • anti-fraud / spam / scam systems
  • accounts receivable & billing systems
  • QA / automated testing
  • queuing / job scheduling systems
  • networking protocols
  • build systems
  • project management

LayoutNode.Content: The ideal candidate:
LayoutNode.SRC: The ideal candidate:

LayoutNode.Content: self-motivated and highly productive a data-driven problem solver passionate about helping (and delighting) end users loves learning and teaching others passion for automation makes teammates better resourceful and adaptable communicates effectively empathetic and self-aware loves craigslist
LayoutNode.SRC:
• self-motivated and highly productive
  • a data-driven problem solver
  • passionate about helping (and delighting) end users
  • loves learning and teaching others
  • passion for automation
  • makes teammates better
  • resourceful and adaptable
  • communicates effectively
  • empathetic and self-aware
  • loves craigslist

LayoutNode.Content: A sampling of the technologies we work with includes:
LayoutNode.SRC: A sampling of the technologies we work with includes:

LayoutNode.Content: Linux, Apache, MySQL, Perl Python, Node.js, C/C++ JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX redis, SQLite HTML, CSS, JSON, XML
LayoutNode.SRC:
Linux, Apache, MySQL, Perl
  • Python, Node.js, C/C++
  • JavaScript, jQuery, AJAX
  • redis, SQLite
  • HTML, CSS, JSON, XML

LayoutNode.Content: craigslist offers:
LayoutNode.SRC: craigslist offers:

LayoutNode.Content: an unusually philanthropic company mission and philosophy a small team (~50) of fun-loving, smart, interesting, idealistic people non-garden-variety tech challenges at billion-page-view-per-day scale a tech nirvana, free from VCs, MBAs, sales, marketing, biz dev, or pivoting big company stability and benefits -- w/o the dysfunction and despair competitive market rates for you -- free classifieds for humanity
LayoutNode.SRC:
• an unusually philanthropic company mission and philosophy
  • a small team (~50) of fun-loving, smart, interesting, idealistic people
  • non-garden-variety tech challenges at billion-page-view-per-day scale
  • a tech nirvana, free from VCs, MBAs, sales, marketing, biz dev, or pivoting
  • big company stability and benefits -- w/o the dysfunction and despair
  • competitive market rates for you -- free classifieds for humanity

LayoutNode.Content: craigslist benefits include:
LayoutNode.SRC: craigslist benefits include:

LayoutNode.Content: 100% paid (including eligible dependents) health and dental insurance craigslist-provided health reimbursement account ($4K-$10K) 3-to-1 match on employee charitable donations (up to 10% of salary) 401(k) matching program (up to 6% of salary), with immediate vesting 4 weeks paid time off; 10 paid holidays paid parental leave commuting stipend (up to $360/month) wellness stipend (up to $150/month) mobile phone and at-home internet stipend (up to $250/month) bike-friendly culture, in-office bicycle parking healthy (vegan, vegetarian, omnivore) breakfast, lunch, and snacks daily SF HQ - 25' ceilings, all natural light, adjustable height desks, CoffeeBot 9000
LayoutNode.SRC:
• 100% paid (including eligible dependents) health and dental insurance
  • craigslist-provided health reimbursement account ($4K-$10K)
  • 3-to-1 match on employee charitable donations (up to 10% of salary)
  • 401(k) matching program (up to 6% of salary), with immediate vesting
  • 4 weeks paid time off; 10 paid holidays
  • paid parental leave
  • commuting stipend (up to $360/month)
  • wellness stipend (up to $150/month)
  • mobile phone and at-home internet stipend (up to $250/month)
  • bike-friendly culture, in-office bicycle parking
  • healthy (vegan, vegetarian, omnivore) breakfast, lunch, and snacks daily
  • SF HQ - 25' ceilings, all natural light, adjustable height desks, CoffeeBot 9000

LayoutNode.Content: Please note: This position is based in craigslist's San Francisco office. Relocation expenses will be reimbursed. Candidates must be authorized to work in the UnitedStates without sponsorship. To apply, please reply with your plain text resume, a cover email which includes a summary of your technical strengths and interests, and WEB DEV in the subjectline. No attachments, please. craigslist is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate based sex (including pregnancy, perceived pregnancy, childbirth, breastfeeding, and relatedmedical conditions), age, genetic information, marital/domestic partner status, medical condition (including cancer, genetic characteristics, or AIDS/HIV),mental/physical disability, national origin or ancestry (including language use and holding a driver's license granted under Vehicle Code section 12801.9), race andcolor, religion, creed, gender (including actual/perceived gender identity, expression, or transition, and transgender or gender non-conforming status), sexualorientation, weight, height, military/veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local laws.
